rows.label: qst701603_msg0001
rows.name:
Right. We've got to think of something
that'll really knock the judges for six!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, yes! Wouldn't it be delightful if
we won?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0003
rows.name:
Why are you two getting so fired up
over this?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0004
rows.name: Do lighten up Shin! It's just a bit of fun!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0005
rows.name:
Cooking contests are all about
appealing to the judges' tastes.
We have to pick carefully.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0006
rows.name: Yes, very true.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0007
rows.name:
The judges are Adel-sama,
Hugo and Maulton-san...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0008
rows.name:
Furthermore, from what Adel-sama
told me...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0009
rows.name:
The renowned gourmet Morimori will
also be attending the event.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0010
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]A renowned gourmet? Hmm...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0011
rows.name:
Yeah, I hear there'll be a few others
showing up as well.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0012
rows.name:
It'll be difficult to work out their
preferences, but I know for a fact that
Adel loves his Pan-Fried Tartari.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0013
rows.name: Pan-Fried Tartari...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0014
rows.name:
Mouthwatering, isn't it? It's so soft
and succulent...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0015
rows.name: Yes, it's quite exquisite!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0016
rows.name:
I've always wanted to try my hand at
that. Could be a good opportunity.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0017
rows.name: Yeah, go for it!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0018
rows.name:
For the ingredients, we'll need
Buloofo Beastmeast and Rhogul
Birdmeat.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0019
rows.name:
Ideally, we'd want Weeping Flour, Nest
Extract, and Barbed Tomatoes too.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0020
rows.name:
Mmm, I can already taste it melting
in my mouth...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0021
rows.name: Laura-sama it just occurred to me.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0022
rows.name: Kasumi?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0023
rows.name:
What if the other participants decide
on the same strategy as ours?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0024
rows.name:
You think they might prepare the
exact same meal?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0025
rows.name: Yes. Supposing they do?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0026
rows.name:
Well...it still won't be a problem if
our Tartari outclasses the rest of
them, right?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0027
rows.name:
But if we do all make the same dish,
it does lower our chances of success...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0028
rows.name: How about a dessert, then?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0029
rows.name: Yes, dessert! I approve!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0030
rows.name: Great!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0031
rows.name: And whose favorite would that be?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0032
rows.name: I know I'd love it!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0033
rows.name: Me too!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0035
rows.name:
I don't really do sweet dishes,
normally.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0036
rows.name: Though it couldn't hurt to try...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0037
rows.name:
What would we be making,
specifically?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0038
rows.name:
I could bake a cake that I saw
in Invidia. Would that do?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0039
rows.name:
For the ingredients, I'll need
Cranberry Bells, Ruska Flour,
some more Weeping Flour...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0040
rows.name:
And finally, some Melosian Honey and
a few Lactonuts.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0041
rows.name: That sounds divine!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0042
rows.name:
What do you think Laura-sama?
Which is our best bet?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0043
rows.name:
We'll have to choose between the
two, won't we. Hrmm...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0044
rows.name:
What do you think Shin? Which would
you be happier with?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0046
rows.name:
The Pan-Fried Tartari would be
easier to make, but I'd say we've
a good chance with either choice.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0047
rows.name: Hm, that's not making it any easier...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0048
rows.name:
Well, if we're still on the fence, why
don't we make both and decide which
one to serve at the last moment?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0049
rows.name: Not a bad idea.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0050
rows.name:
All right, let's do that. We can
meet back here at the inn once
Shin prepared the meals.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0051
rows.name: Excellent!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0052
rows.name: Best of luck Shin!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0053
rows.name: Yeah...
